name: part_003
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony CREATORS' STAGE【チラ見せ】 [wCblx1C_j68]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Commercial for hololive goods from LIFESTYLE BANDAI and Ichiban Kuji.
Performance of 'The Last Frontier' and announcement of scale figures for Hoshimachi Suisei and AZKi.
FuRyu Prize announcement for various hololive plushies and figures.
Promotion for UNDONE x hololive SUPER EXPO collaboration watches.
Announcement of iPASS (Taiwan) hololive 6th fes. limited blind packs.
JOYSOUND X1 karaoke commercial featuring a rap about its features.
TAITO DOQUTE brand 100cm plushie announcement for several hololive members.
Announcement for 'Groove Coaster: Future Performers' featuring Shirakami Fubuki and Sakura Miko.
KONAMI x hololive EXPO 2025 collaboration events teaser.
PalVerse and PalVerse Pale. figure line announcements.
Design COCO scale figure announcements for multiple hololive talents.
Meiri Shurui collaboration drinks showcasing past releases.
Street Fighter 6 x hololive collaboration announcement.
A montage of support messages from fans for 'Color Rise Harmony'.

subtitles.original: LIFESTYLE BANDAI の新商品をご紹介！
subtitles.english: Introducing new products from LIFESTYLE BANDAI!

subtitles.original:
ホロライブエキスポ2025限定の
一番くじ特設フォトブースも展開中！
subtitles.english:
The Ichiban Kuji special photo booth, exclusive to
hololive EXPO 2025, is also now open!

subtitles.original:
モニターをタッチしてくじ券をめくり、
出てきたデザインと一緒に撮影できます。
subtitles.english:
Touch the monitor to flip the lottery ticket and
take a photo with the design that appears.

subtitles.original: 愛を込めて　捧げる歌を...
subtitles.english: With all my love, this song I offer...

subtitles.original: 舞い上がれ　旅立ちの歌を
subtitles.english: Soar high, this song of departure

subtitles.original: スケールフィギュア化決定 星街すいせい AZKi
subtitles.english: Scale figure adaptation decided: Hoshimachi Suisei, AZKi

subtitles.original:
フリューから『ホロライブ』プライズが
全国アミューズメント施設にて続々展開中！
subtitles.english:
Hololive prizes from FuRyu are appearing
one after another in amusement facilities nationwide!

subtitles.original: 4月からは新たにひっかけフィギュアも登場！
subtitles.english: New Hikkake figures will also be available starting from April!

subtitles.original:
90人の hololive と HOLOSTARS タレントから
好きな一人を選ぼう！
subtitles.english:
Choose your favorite from 90 hololive
and HOLOSTARS talents!

subtitles.original: 3月8日より先行予約開始
subtitles.english: Pre-orders start March 8th

subtitles.original: 台湾旅行中、最も便利な決済サービスを提供します。
subtitles.english: Providing the most convenient payment service while traveling in Taiwan.

subtitles.original: hololive 6th fes. 一カ通限定盲包 第一弾
subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. iPASS Limited Blind Pack Vol. 1

subtitles.original: だったら JOYSOUND X1 で歌おうぜ！
subtitles.english: In that case, let's sing with JOYSOUND X1!

subtitles.original: 歌いたい曲があるって最高
subtitles.english: It's the best to have the songs you want to sing

subtitles.original:
超特大ぬいぐるみブランド どきゅーと から
商品化決定！
subtitles.english:
Merchandise decided from the
extra-large plushie brand, DOQUTE!

subtitles.original: 約100cmサイズ ぬいぐるみに！
subtitles.english: Into approximately 100cm size plushies!

subtitles.original: グルーヴコースター最新作に、白上フブキと...
subtitles.english: In the latest Groove Coaster game, Shirakami Fubuki and...

subtitles.original: ...さくらみこがキャラクターボイスで参戦！
subtitles.english: ...Sakura Miko join as character voices!

subtitles.original: 人気曲や、私たちが歌う曲も楽しめる！
subtitles.english: Enjoy popular songs and the ones we sing!

subtitles.original: 私たちがグルーヴワールドをナビゲートするよ！
subtitles.english: We'll be your guides to the Groove World!

subtitles.original: コラボイベント実施中！ ホロライブエキスポ コナミ
subtitles.english: Collaboration events currently underway! hololive EXPO KONAMI

subtitles.original: ゲームのオアシスに飛び込め！
subtitles.english: Dive into the gaming oasis!

subtitles.original: PalVerse フィギュア化決定！！
subtitles.english: PalVerse figure adaptation decided!!

subtitles.original:
白上フブキ・大神ミオ フィギュア化決定
3月8日(土) 予約開始！！
subtitles.english:
Shirakami Fubuki & Ookami Mio figure adaptation decided.
Pre-orders start Saturday, March 8th!!

subtitles.original: 宝鐘マリン 1/7スケールフィギュア 締切間近
subtitles.english: Houshou Marine 1/7 scale figure deadline approaching

subtitles.original: 推しの夢叶えます。 明利酒類
subtitles.english: Fulfilling your oshi's dreams. Meiri Shurui

subtitles.original: 2025年夏 コラボカフェ・プライズ 開催決定
subtitles.english: Collaboration cafe and prizes decided for Summer 2025

subtitles.original: hololive 6th fes. 応援メッセージボード
subtitles.english: hololive 6th fes. Support Message Board
